message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair offer considering the inflation will affect you more than me.
I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor.  While inflation will hit me harder, I think this is a fair compromise considering I'm giving you a chance to get something in the first round.
Bob, your offer in round 2 was cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing 55/45 in my favor.  It acknowledges the inflation disparity but ensures we both leave with something worthwhile.
